text: Was thinking of bringing in boozy cocoa/coffee ingredients for those of us in the office this week. Anyone interested? Special requests?
definitely interested!
kahlua?

ooo good call. We can make it a drunken cocoa bar. I'm already packing Caramel Baileys, Peppermint schnapps, Godiva liquor for booze. Also have Cocoa mix + coconut milk. Heading to the store for marshmallows + milk.
Let me know if ya'll want anything else.
oh nice.
i may make some puerto rican egg nog this week and i'll bring that in.
Puerto rican egg nog? yowza
that sounds like a drug
are there any services where you can order coal or poop sent to someone? I have an evil doppelganger who ordered a nice GoPro Hero using my credit card.
whaaaat
Probably not a good idea, but I'm kind of mad that I have to waste a bunch of time sorting out this fraud with Target
yea that sucks
ugh...sucks
1-800-YUU-UUCK
<@U02F8TTPU>: <http://www.mailpoop.com/index.html>
hee hee <@U026103R3>, perfect
that sucks. happy to introduce you to my sister, who has been actively destroying the life of the person in chicago who stole her identity
Oh shit! I forgot about that
Didn't she need a new SSN?
<@U02F8TTPU> you could probably call up a farm that sells manure fertilizer and order a truckload. make sure it's COD (charge on delivery).

<!channel>: The over-the-top coffee/cocoa bar is ready for your perusal. We have 3 kinds of cocoa, 3 kinds of milk (coconut, whole, 1/2&1/2), 6 types of liqueurs, 4 kinds of marshmallows (including some horrifying snowman peeps), candy cane stirrers,  and a fresh pot of java - all in the new kitchen.  Happy Holidays ya'll.
:ok_hand:
:sparkles: Wow! Thank you <@U02HCCTFL>.
<@U02F8TTPU>: It's mostly selfish.
I have some moonstruck dark chocolate cocoa powder at home. i will bring that in for the holidrink bar.
goes great in a white russian!
<@U026PT0D7>: we have all the stuff for white russians! Lebowski party?
obviously
although I don't have a bathrobe to wear
Oh, I've always wanted to be Jesus for halloween. This is my chance.
Idea for next year's holiday swag: <http://www.scoutbooks.com/shop/category/make-your-own/>
so they changed the timing of the stairwell doors, but that doesn't seem to have helped, because i just "broke in" to the 3rd floor using the elevator.
Don't know if we're doing another wearables report but this is cool inspiration for long form blog posts.
<http://mailchimp.com/2014/>
<@U026PT0D7>: stairwell doors lock at 5pm, elevator works until 8. it just manages the funnel of traffic.
<@U02618EV1> wow, that is a nice page. I even like scrolling through the whitespace on my android.
<@U02F8TTPU>: Is that "good" whitespace or "broken site" whitespace? :wink:
<@U02618EV1> Big whitespace on mobile usually annoys me, but this felt right. Enough space between ideas to make me pay attention and enjoy the animations.
Agreed.
